attributes.action: "I GIVE YOU EVERY PLANT THAT BEARS SEED FOR IT SHALL BE FOOD "  DENY GODS WILL !
attributes.additional_details: Evidence from around the world is gatherng at a huge rate, usa isreal indi pakistan ....you cannot deny the evidence any more. We are seeing micro dosing very effective too, This is NOT ABOUT GETTING STONED !  WHO itself reccomends cannabis yet government ignores this, WE the people say enough is enough , people are in pain suffering fits, cancers, depression , addictions, cannabis helps all these and soooo much more .
attributes.background:
As a nation you have taken away our god given rights, WE DEMAND THEM BACK !  
We the people know Cannabis to be a gift for mankind by our lord the creator, the lawmaker for all. 
Cannabis is a food stuff, you have no right to take a food and call it a drug to falistate profit for big pharma !
